QuestData.Title: Double Tap
QuestData.Description:
The House of Rituals occupies the southern half of the temple. Unlike the constructs, their key advantage in battle is their endless army of risen fighters.
Thankfully, the Archonic Resonator we recovered will take care of it.
As we carve our way through their forces, blast their corpses with the resonator. Its energy will sunder their souls, preventing them from being raised to fight again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Archonic Resonator to sunder $1oa House of Rituals soldiers' corpses.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Thanikos at the Shattered Span.
QuestData.RewardText: The Resonator is working at full capacity and our foes are dispatched. Excellent.
